page.title: 19A Day In The Life Of Joanna
page.content:
I wake up at about 7.00am and I get up at about 7.30.I get dressed and go downstairs for a breakfast of cereal,toast and a glass of orange.At about 8.30 I leave for school on my bike.It takes me about five minutes to reach the school.The bell rings at 8.55 and everybody lines up until a teacher comes and then we go inside.At 10.30 we have break and at 10.45 we go back inside.Lunch is at 12.15 and we come back in from lunch break at 1.30. The bell rings at 3.30 and everybody goes home.When I get home I do my homework then I watch t.v.At about 6.00 I have my tea.I go to bed at about 9.30.
{
